entry.data:
SUNNY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 80S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN PARTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
BREEZY WITH HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
SOUTH WINDS 15 TO 25 MPH
GUSTS UP TO 40 MPH IN THE AFTERNOON
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

SHOWERS WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING
BREEZY WITH LOWS IN THE MID 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 80 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS
BREEZY WITH HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT
